Name: Through the Mirror
About the game: A game about trust. Even though they live in separate worlds, have oposite world views and are completely different, they still work with the some goal in mind. Thrugh the Mirror is a puzzle platformer based on mind bending mirrored mechanics. It's an expanded version of a Ludum Dare game, complete with a lot new levels, game mechanics and visuals.
